SQLWhere.SQLJoin: inner join dbo.VW_FEEMATRIXENV vw_env on (vw_env.IDFEEMATRIX=tblmain.IDFEEMATRIX) left outer join dbo.VW_FEEMATRIXINSTR vw_ti2 on (vw_ti2.TYPEINSTR=tblmain.TYPEINSTR and vw_ti2.ID_=tblmain.IDINSTR) left outer join dbo.VW_FEEMATRIXINSTR vw_tiu2 on (vw_tiu2.TYPEINSTR_UNL=tblmain.TYPEINSTR_UNL and vw_tiu2.ID_=tblmain.IDINSTR_UNL) left outer join dbo.VW_FEEMATRIXCT vw_tc2 on (vw_tc2.TYPECONTRACT=tblmain.TYPECONTRACT and vw_tc2.ID_=tblmain.IDCONTRACT) left outer join dbo.VW_FEEMATRIXEXCPCT vw_tc4 on (vw_tc4.TYPECONTRACTEXCEPT=tblmain.TYPECONTRACTEXCEPT and vw_tc4.ID_=tblmain.IDCONTRACTEXCEPT) left outer join dbo.VW_FEEMATRIXPARTYA vw_pa2 on (vw_pa2.FEETYPEPARTYA=tblmain.FEETYPEPARTYA and vw_pa2.ID_=tblmain.IDPARTYA) left outer join dbo.VW_FEEMATRIXPARTYB vw_pb2 on (vw_pb2.FEETYPEPARTYB=tblmain.FEETYPEPARTYB and vw_pb2.ID_=tblmain.IDPARTYB)

Condition.SQLWhere: ( (IDMENU='OTC_INP_TRD' or (IDMENU like 'OTC_INP_TRD_%' and IDMENU not in ('OTC_INP_TRD_RES','OTC_INP_TRD_BAR_TRG','OTC_INP_TRD_CSR','OTC_INP_TRD_SPLIT'))) and PERMISSION='Create' )
(TYPEINSTR='%%COLUMN_VALUE%%TYPEINSTR%%') and (GPRODUCT in ('*','%%COLUMN_VALUE%%GPRODUCT%%') or '%%COLUMN_VALUE%%GPRODUCT%%'='' or '%%COLUMN_VALUE%%GPRODUCT%%' is null)
